attributes.action: Increase the minimum annual leave from 20 days to 25 days + public holidays
attributes.background: This will improve the morale in workforces and benefit families with children who are in school who can't afford child care or to take days unpaid throughout term breaks

rejection.details:
There are different rules for different types of workers, see here: https://www.gov.uk/holiday-entitlement-rights/entitlement

The current statutory minimum for full-time workers is 28 days' paid annual leave. We're not sure which group of workers you would like to receive 25 days' leave plus bank holidays.
